name: Swan Blindly
description:
Swan Blindly is a mobile adventure puzzle game where you play as a blind cygnet in search of their missing family in a world plagued by bird blindness and a mythical black swan that hunts its own kind.

Traverse through the polluted park, clear obstacles, meet new characters, and evade The Black Swan to find out where your family went.

Developed by GoodLuckHaveFun, gamedev students at
UOWM KDU.

 🦢 ~
